item.description:
Hello All,


My name is Ruben and I'm the new Organizer of Cocktails & Conversations!  I'm proud to be the new Organizer because not only do I believe in what the group is doing, I'm also a good friend of Danielle's (the former Organizer)!

 

For the month of September I won't be able to set up an event since we are halfway through the month already.  Instead, I'd like to invite you to an event that I already have scheduled.

 

It's for a great cause and you will no doubt meet great people!  Check it out at http://www.facebook.com/events/182504691884104/
item.name: Life is good (Fundraiser and Networking) Event
